Title: Provides for the issuance of summonses to parents of any juvenile who is the subject of a juvenile delinquency petition
Summary: Provides for the issuance of summonses to each parent, including a non-custodial parent, of any juvenile who is the subject of a juvenile delinquency petition.
LawCode: Amd ยง312.1, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, in relation to service of summonses upon parents in juvenile delinquency cases
